title: WTB: T206 Sullivan, Dougherty, Bergen, Jones
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Sullivan, Dougherty, Bergen, Jones
posts.post_content:
Hi. Would like to replace one of these cards that I got rid of a while back.:(
Must be graded PSA 4 or 5 or SGC 40 to 60 (no creases). Billy Sullivan, Patsy Dougherty (portrait), Fielder Jones (portrait) or Bill Bergen (batting).
Send prices and scans to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url]
Thanks!
